moves.name: Activate!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed and evasiveness. Ensures that the user’s next attack will be a critical hit.

moves.name: Parabolic Charge
moves.effect: Restores the user’s HP based on the amount of damage dealt to the target.

syncMove.name: Light-Up-the-World Thunderbolt
syncMove.description: The more the target’s Speed is lowered, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Charging Sun 5
passives.description: Powers up moves when the weather is sunny.

passives.name: HP Advantage 4
passives.description: The more HP the user has remaining, the more it powers up moves.
